title: Bodie Troll 01-04 (of 04|2013|Dgtl) (Bean-Empire + Bodie-Bridge)
description:
Publisher's promotional description: "In the fairytale village of Hagadorn lurks Bodie Troll, a fuzzy little grump who wants to be big and scary, but is doomed to be cute and cuddly. But what Bodie lacks in terror he makes up for in mischief.

'Fans of such classic works as Jay Ward's "Fractured Fairy Tales", Jim Henson's "Muppets", and Maurice Sendak's "Where the Wild Things Are" will feel at home in the wild, warm and whimsical romp of Bodie's adventures,' said creator Jay P Fosgitt."

---

Details per <a href=" http://www.comicbookdb.com/title.php?ID=40059" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.comicbookdb.com/title.php?ID=40059</a>

Bodie Troll (2013) - #1-#4 (Red 5 Comics)

Writer, Penciller, Inker, Colorist:   Jay Fosgitt

Cover Dates:                          April, June, September, November 2013
Cover Price:                          US $2.99
Format:                               Color; Standard Comic Issue; 28 pages

---

- Issue one is in Digital Hi-Res from Bean-Empire.
- Issues two thru four are in Digital Lo-Res from an indie ripper (or perhaps one of the familiar ones using a whimsical ad-hoc tag?)
